* Experience: 3 to 12 years
* Location: Pune \\& Chennai
* Work Mode: WFO (No Hybrid / WFH)
* Notice Period: Immediate Joiners / 30 / 45 Days
* Note: Fiserv (No Poach) – Candidate must not have worked directly with Fiserv in the last 1 year or through other vendors for Fiserv projects in the last 6 months.


**Responsibilities**
* 3\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in Base24 Classic covering:
+ ATM Device Handler (NCR, Diebold, Triton)
+ AUTH, HISO, interchange interface processes, BICI
+ POS Device Handler (HPDH, SPDH, APAC), RTAU, APAC
+ Proven technical skills in Design, Development, Unit Testing, Implementation, and Pre/Post Implementation Support.

* Strong domain/product knowledge of Base24, card payments industry, Credit and Debit functionalities, and lifecycle.
* Strong technical expertise in TAL, TACL, SCOBOL \\& COBOL programming.

* Familiar with EMS, Audits, NCPCOM, Pathway, Requester/Server Debug, Refresh and Extract processes.
* Hands\\-on experience in Base24 Classic Development across various modules.
* Proficient in XPNET configuration and commands.
* Good understanding of Base24 source codes, change \\& release management, application debugging, and problem resolution.
* Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills on Base24 ATM, POS, Schemes, BIC ISO, Host ISO interchange interfaces.
* Knowledge of simulators: ASSET/FINSIM, MasterCard, VISA, Amex, SIMPP configuration and usage.
* Good understanding of ISO8583, ISO93 message formats; experience with banking industry messaging standards.
* Experience in applying mandates, enhancing modules for EMV and Tokenization support.
